settings.name: Minimum ground speed for model building.
settings.description: Provide the minimum ground speed (unit = m/s) of your tracked species. Only locations with speed larger than it will be used for model building. Default: 4 m/s However, all locations will be annotated and returned for use in a next App.

settings.name: Maximum ground speed for model building
settings.description: Provide the maximum ground speed (unit = m/s) of your tracked species. Only locations with speed less than it will be used for model building. Default: 25 m/s. However, all locations will be annotated and returned for use in a next App.

references.note: Safi, K., Kranstauber, B., Weinzierl, R. et al. Flying with the wind: scale dependency of speed and direction measurements in modelling wind support in avian flight. Mov Ecol 1, 4 (2013)
